info.description: A comprehensive API for managing firearm parts, models, and compatibility.
info.title: Sauron Backend API

get.description: Check if two parts are compatible for a specific firearm model
Get a list of all compatibility rules in the database

post.description: Add a new compatibility rule to the database

get.description: Get all compatibility rules for a specific firearm model and part
get.summary: Get compatibility rules by firearm and part

get.description: Get all compatibility rules for a specific part
get.summary: Get compatibility rules by part ID

get.description: Get details of a specific compatibility rule
get.summary: Get a compatibility rule by ID

put.description: Update details of a specific compatibility rule

get.description: Get a list of all firearm models in the database

post.description: Add a new firearm model to the database

get.description: Get details of a specific firearm model
get.summary: Get a firearm model by ID

put.description: Update details of a specific firearm model

get.description: Get a list of all product listings in the database

post.description: Add a new product listing to the database

get.description: Get all product listings for a specific part
Get all product listings for a specific prebuilt firearm
Get all product listings for a specific seller
Get details of a specific product listing
get.summary: Get a product listing by ID

put.description: Update details of a specific product listing

patch.description: Update the availability and optionally the price of a specific listing

get.description: Get a list of all prebuilt firearms in the database

post.description: Add a new prebuilt firearm to the database

get.description: Get all prebuilt firearms for a specific firearm model
Get details of a specific prebuilt firearm
get.summary: Get a prebuilt firearm by ID

put.description: Update details of a specific prebuilt firearm

get.description: Get a list of all sellers in the database

post.description: Add a new seller to the database

get.description: Get details of a specific seller

put.description: Update details of a specific seller

patch.description: Update the status of a specific seller

get.description: Get a list of all user suggestions in the database

post.description: Add a new user suggestion to the database

get.description: Get all user suggestions with a specific status
Get details of a specific user suggestion
get.summary: Get a user suggestion by ID

put.description: Update details of a specific user suggestion

patch.description: Update the status of a specific user suggestion

sauron-backend_internal_models.Compatibi.description: Rules defining compatibility between different parts and firearm models

compatible_with_part_id.description: ID of the part that is compatible with the primary part

details.description:
Additional details about the compatibility rule
@Description JSON object containing specific compatibility details

firearm_model_id.description: ID of the firearm model this rule applies to

id.description: Unique identifier for the compatibility rule

part.description: Primary part in the compatibility relationship

part_id.description: ID of the primary part in this compatibility rule

sauron-backend_internal_models.FirearmMo.description: Firearm model information including required and compatible parts

compatible_parts.description:
List of compatible parts for this firearm model
@Description JSON array of compatible part categories

id.description: Unique identifier for the firearm model

required_parts.description:
List of required parts for this firearm model
@Description JSON array of required part names

sauron-backend_internal_models.Part.description: Detailed information about a firearm part including compatibility and restrictions

compatibility.description:
Compatibility information with other parts and models
@Description JSON object containing compatibility rules

is_prebuilt.description: Whether this is a pre-built component

legal_restrictions.description:
Legal restrictions or requirements for this part
@Description JSON object containing legal restriction details

required_sub_components.description:
List of required sub-components for this part
@Description JSON array of required sub-component names

sub_components.description:
List of sub-components that make up this part
@Description JSON array of sub-component details

sauron-backend_internal_models.PrebuiltF.description: Complete firearm configuration with specific components

components.description:
List of components included in this build
@Description JSON object containing component details and specifications

firearm_model_id.description: ID of the base firearm model

id.description: Unique identifier for the prebuilt firearm

sauron-backend_internal_models.ProductLi.description: Product listing information including pricing and availability

additional_info.description:
Additional seller-specific information
@Description JSON object containing additional product details

id.description: Unique identifier for the product listing

last_checked.description: Last time the listing was checked/updated

part.description: Related part information if this is a part listing

part_id.description: Optional: ID of the part if this listing is for a part

prebuilt_firearm.description: Related prebuilt firearm information if this is a prebuilt listing

prebuilt_id.description: Optional: ID of the prebuilt firearm if this listing is for a prebuilt

seller_id.description: ID of the seller offering this product

shipping_info.description:
Shipping information
@Description JSON object containing shipping details

url.description: URL to the product on the seller's website

sauron-backend_internal_models.Seller.description: Information about sellers and their API integrations

api_endpoint.description: API endpoint for the seller's integration

settings.description:
Additional seller-specific settings
@Description JSON object containing seller configuration

status.description: Current status of the seller (active, inactive, suspended)

sauron-backend_internal_models.UserSugge.description: User suggestions for new content or improvements

model_name.description: Name of the suggested model or part

status.description: Current status of the suggestion (pending, approved, rejected)

suggested_parts.description:
List of suggested parts or modifications
@Description JSON object containing detailed suggestions
